Geothermal reservoir.Description: Geothermal power plants extract heat from geothermal reservoirs to generate electricity.
Geothermal heat pumps utilize the heat from geothermal reservoirs for heating and cooling buildings.
Geothermal reservoirs are the source of geothermal energy, which is a renewable and sustainable form of energy.
Geothermal wells are drilled to access the hot water or steam in geothermal reservoirs for various applications.
